short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This handy Chrome extension allows you to create and save Stick it - web notes  directly on the websites you visit
short.fr,ja: This handy Chrome extension allows you to create and save sticky notes directly on the websites you visit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
keep your thoughts organized across the web with Stick it - web notes! This handy Chrome extension allows you to create and save sticky notes directly on the websites you visit. Whether you're researching on StackOverflow, working on a project in GitHub, or browsing any other site, Stick it - web notes helps you capture your ideas, reminders, and to-do lists right where you need them.

Features:
- Create and save sticky notes that are linked to specific websites.
- Easily access and manage your notes whenever you return to the site.
- Organize your thoughts with multiple notes per website.
- Intuitive and user-friendly interface for seamless note-taking.

v1.0.2
- Header colors
- Bug fixes 

Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to stay organized while browsing the web. Download  Stick it - web notes and never lose track of your ideas again!
